channel.title: Modify more than one color HELP

item.title: Modify more than one color HELP
item.dc:creator: @genoarch genoarch
item.description:
@genoarch wrote:

How can i modify more than one model color through th ints? i can do it through metaseq but if i wanan just throw in a recolor real quick how can i do it.

here is my dark bow, right now it has like 5 different colors but i can only change one, which means only one little section is recolored.

if(i == 13759) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 26386; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 26279; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 26279; itemDef.modelZoom = 2128; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 591; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1034; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.name = "Dark Bow"; itemDef.description = "A Lime Dark Bow".getBytes(); itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 17350; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 1571; }

Read full topic
item.source: Modify more than one color HELP
